channel.title: Machine Learning on Ankit Dhall

item.title: Thermal Demand Modelling
item.description: This research aims at applying a novel idea of utilizing an ANN (Artificial Neural Network) black-box model to predict the space heating demand of households in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. This research was conducted as a continuation of an ongoing study at the Ryerson Centre for Sustainable Energy Systems (CSES). Being able to model and predict the space heating needs of a household can help reduce energy consumption, and in turn, reduce the total greenhouse gas emissions from households.
